name: Geeks Chicago
tagline: Web, Mobile, Design & Development - Geeks Chicago
description:
Geeks Chicago is a full-service development and design firm with over 14 years of experience in the digital space. We specialize in custom web and mobile development. This includes iOS, Android, and custom web applications. 
Geeks also work with all major CMS systems including WordPress, Drupal and Joomla. We have an extensive background developing systems with many different API's, both custom and third party. Some of the third parties have included PayPal, Stripe, Google API integration. The Geeks team has worked with clients in many different industries on many types of projects. Our team of experts are available to make sure your website or application are done correctly the first time and always within budget.
